item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Wednesday, April 30, 2025 at 1:20 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Waymo partners with Toyota to bring autonomous driving to personal vehicles (295 points | 219 comments)
2. Jepsen: Amazon RDS for PostgreSQL 17.4 (242 points | 74 comments)
3. Chain of Recursive Thoughts: Make AI think harder by making it argue with itself (345 points | 173 comments)
4. Path Isn't Real on Linux (38 points | 15 comments)
5. Help ChatGPT discover your products (39 points | 35 comments)
6. Bamba: An open-source LLM that crosses a transformer with an SSM (127 points | 39 comments)
7. I use zip bombs to protect my server (322 points | 171 comments)
8. Everything we announced at our first LlamaCon (134 points | 70 comments)
9. An illustrated guide to automatic sparse differentiation (13 points | 1 comment)
10. Only Teslas exempt from new auto tariffs thanks to 85% domestic content rule (216 points | 210 comments)
11. It's School time: Adventures in hacking an old Kindle (73 points | 14 comments)
12. China's Clinical Trial Boom (109 points | 57 comments)
13. Show HN: Beatsync – perfect audio sync across multiple devices (190 points | 50 comments)
14. Performance optimization is hard because it's fundamentally a brute-force task (213 points | 96 comments)
15. Modern Realty (YC S24) Is Hiring ( | hide)
16. ArkFlow: High-performance Rust stream processing engine (132 points | 28 comments)
17. Programming languages should have a tree traversal primitive (180 points | 139 comments)
18. Show HN: A Chrome extension that will auto-reject non-essential cookies (202 points | 124 comments)
19. Firefox tab groups are here (506 points | 305 comments)
20. Show HN: An MCP server for understanding AWS costs (27 points | 3 comments)
21. O3 beats a master-level GeoGuessr player, even with fake EXIF data (370 points | 259 comments)
22. Finding paths of least action with gradient descent (2023) (33 points | 3 comments)
23. Princeton Engineering Anomalies Research (2010) (14 points | 1 comment)
24. Show HN: An interactive demo of QR codes' error correction (57 points | 7 comments)
25. Indian court orders blocking of Proton Mail (293 points | 128 comments)
26. Show HN: AgenticSeek – Self-hosted alternative to cloud-based AI tools (64 points | 12 comments)
27. The last masters of Afro-Colombian machete fencing (42 points | 14 comments)
28. Show HN: Flowcode – Turing-complete visual programming platform (158 points | 67 comments)
29. LibreLingo – FOSS Alternative to Duolingo (678 points | 308 comments)
30. AirBorne: Wormable zero-click remote code execution (RCE) in AirPlay protocol (62 points | 7 comments)
